entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:53 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
